sen.j: 古歌集（こかしゅう）は、歌集。
sen.e: Kokashu is a collection of Japanese poetry.
Kokashu is a collection of Japanese poetry.
Kokashu is a collection of Japanese poetry.

sen.j: 『万葉集』の左注にその書名が見える。
sen.e: The title of this collection is found in a left note in "Manyoshu" (the first major anthology of early Japanese poetry).
The title of this collection is found in a left note in "Manyoshu" (the first major anthology of early Japanese poetry).
The title of this collection is found in a left note in "Manyoshu" (the first major anthology of early Japanese poetry).

sen.j: 巻数、編者その他は不明。
sen.e: Its number of volumes, compiler, and other information are unknown.
Its number of volumes, compiler, and other information are unknown.
Its number of volumes, compiler, and other information are unknown.

sen.j: 長歌2首、旋頭歌6首、短歌18首が伝わる。
sen.e: Two Choka (long poem), six Sedoka (head-repeated poem), and 18 Tanka (thirty-one syllables' poem) are extant.
Two Choka (long poem), six Sedoka (head-repeated poem), and 18 Tanka (thirty-one syllables' poem) are extant.
Two Choka (long poem), six Sedoka (head-repeated poem), and 18 Tanka (thirty-one syllables' poem) are extant.
